issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Clean up of parameters that need not change at run time.

comments.body: Some parameters need not change at run time.  Also, adds a test that will check the parameters defined as restricted in HiveConf.java.

the commit have missed some new files; I've added an addendum commit.
[~stakiar]: I would recommend to check out {{git apply -3 -p0 file.patch}} which handles new files better; because it stages them for commit..

Doc note:  hadoop.bin.path and yarn.bin.path need to be added to the list of default values for *hive.conf.restricted.list* in the wiki.

* [Configuration Properties -- hive.conf.restricted.list | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.conf.restricted.list]
